title: Leandro Montebeler
text:
Leandro Rodrigues Montebeler (born 6 April 1984) is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> playing with <a href="Santa%20Quit%C3%A9ria%20Futebol%20Clube">Santa Quitéria</a>.
Leandro Montebeler started his professional career with <a href="Paysandu%20Sport%20Club">Paysandu</a> in his homeland and later went on to play in <a href="Singapore">Singapore</a>, <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a> and <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>.
He won the <a href="Campeonato%20Sul-Mato-Grossense">Campeonato Sul-Mato-Grossense</a> with <a href="Esporte%20Clube%20%C3%81guia%20Negra">Águia Negra</a> in 2012.
In 2013, Leandro Montebeler played with <a href="Ji-Paran%C3%A1%20Futebol%20Clube">Ji-Paraná</a> in the <a href="Campeonato%20Rondoniense">Campeonato Rondoniense</a>.
He played with <a href="FK%20Vojvodina">Vojvodina</a> and <a href="FK%20Napredak%20Kru%C5%A1evac">Napredak Kruševac</a> in the <a href="Serbian%20SuperLiga">Serbian SuperLiga</a>. He also had a spell in Turkey with Adapazarıspor. Then he returned to Brazil where he played, since 2012 onwards, with <a href="Esporte%20Clube%20%C3%81guia%20Negra">Águia Negra</a>, <a href="Ji-Paran%C3%A1%20Futebol%20Clube">Ji-Paraná</a>, <a href="Castelo%20Futebol%20Clube">Castelo</a> and <a href="Santa%20Quit%C3%A9ria%20Futebol%20Clube">Santa Quitéria</a>.
